definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="55" y="-29"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="3"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">You have  </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Worldgrid</field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"> left on the energy Grid.</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="7"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Grid Tie invertor Loation: </field></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">X </field></block></value><value name="ADD2"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:GridX</field></block></value><value name="ADD3"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">  Y </field></block></value><value name="ADD4"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Gridy</field></block></value><value name="ADD5"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">  Z </field></block></value><value name="ADD6"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:GridZ</field></block></value></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
